publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-114 Mr Adam Ingram: Wear Red for Heart Day, Friday 13 June 2003—That the Parliament supports the British Heart Foundation’s "Wear Red for Heart Day" as part of Heart Week 2003 from 7 to 15 June 2003, supports the work of the foundation in its fight against heart and circulatory disease, and urges politicians and others to support "Wear Red for Heart Day" to raise funds for children who need special care.

S2M-114 Mr Adam Ingram: Wear Red for Heart Day, Friday 13 June 2003—That the Parliament supports the British Heart Foundation’s "Wear Red for Heart Day" as part of Heart Week 2003 from 7 to 15 June 2003, supports the work of the foundation in its fight against heart and circulatory disease, and urges politicians and others to support "Wear Red for Heart Day" to raise funds for children who need special care. Supported by: Mr David Davidson*, Ms Sandra White*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Carolyn Leckie*, Michael Matheson*, Murdo Fraser*, Shona Robison*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, David Mundell*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-114 Wear Red for Heart Day, Friday 13 June 2003 (lodged on 5 June 2003) Margaret Jamieson*, Robin Harper*
S2M-114 Wear Red for Heart Day, Friday 13 June 2003 (lodged on 5 June 2003) Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*, Patrick Harvie*, Irene Oldfather*, Cathie Craigie*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-114 Wear Red for Heart Day, Friday 13 June 2003 (lodged on 5 June 2003) Roseanna Cunningham*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-114 Wear Red for Heart Day, Friday 13 June 2003 (lodged on 5 June 2003) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, John Swinburne*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-114 Wear Red for Heart Day, Friday 13 June 2003 (lodged on 5 June 2003) Karen Whitefield*
S2M-114 Wear Red for Heart Day, Friday 13 June 2003 (lodged on 5 June 2003) Elaine Smith*
